error_pattern: Unable to find order and container
summary: The assay alias is not associated to the order or routing
Inbound order could not be matched in Cerner
recommended_action: Check order alias formatting and accession

summary: Orderable alias not built in Code Set 200
recommended_action: Add alias in Code Set 200 for contributor system

summary: Orderable alias missing for inbound OBR
recommended_action: Add alias in Code Set 200 for contributor system

error_pattern: Failed to commit the event ensure
recommended_action: Ensure each OBR contains at least one OBX
Add alias in Code Set 72 or 14003

summary: Addendum sent before original report finalized
recommended_action: Check original report status before resending

summary: Order alias not found in order_alias table
recommended_action: Check leading zeros and alias type/order id
Check OBR-2 / OBR-3 values and aliasing

summary: Contributor system not built or aliased

recommended_action: Check MRN alias and person build

summary: Code value alias missing or invalid
recommended_action: Add alias to correct code set

error_pattern: Failed to construct Child Clinical Event
summary: OBX 3.1 not aliased for assay processing

error_pattern: Unable to complete order for result message
summary: Order result skipped due to status or timing
recommended_action: Check result status and verified date
